title.rendered: Lumiere Runway Announces 2022 LAFW Runway Fashion Show to Benefit Charities

content.rendered:
Los Angeles March 18th 2022 Lumiere Runway announced that they will be hosting a runway fashion show for this years Los Angeles Fashion Week (LAFW) on April 2, 2022 in Hollywood: 7080 Hollywood Blvd., CA 90028.

The show will benefit two causes: local economic empowerment organization Kaimore, and Operation USA, a group delivering aid to Ukrainian families.

Red carpet for the fashion show will begin at 3 PM, and the runway event will start at 4:30 PM. Tickets (at various tiers) to attend the event can be found online at https://www.eventbrite.com/e/lumiere-runway-fashion-show-la-fashion-week-2022-tickets-272339483727.

The show will shine the spotlight on 10 outstanding designers from around the world, including Rossario George, Elegant Essentials, Nathan Clothier, Amot Apparel, Leontine, Freedom Fashion by Stephano Musa, DoviArt Fashion, G.G Virka, 3 Points and High Status.

It will also feature three live performers backing models as they walk: Mac Glitzy, Mckenzi Brooke, and Nakkia Gold.

Partnerships

The show will be held in partnership with Academia Melychis from New York & IMSA Beauty from Hawaii, which supports Lumiere Runways showcase with their team of talented artists for hair and makeup.

Media partners are 24 Fashion TV, Malvie Magazine, H3R Magazine, Maximo TV, Fashion Fair Magazine, D Fashion Magazine, Exquisite Magazine, Moda Million, Style LA.

Lumiere Runway founder Fionna Wong explains, We're excited our LAFW show will make a difference in both our local and global communities. Proceeds from ticket sales will go to helping disempowered LA residents and families impacted by the war in Ukraine. Were also thrilled to feature clothing from eight exciting designers on the runway, and to highlight music by three incredible performers. We know this will be an unforgettable event.

About Lumiere Runway

LUMIERE RUNWAY is an LA- and Hong Kong-based fashion show production company powered by Meler Productions, a producer, event management firm, and e-commerce shopping site. In addition to celebrating artists with innovative fashion shows, Lumiere Runway endeavors to consistently prioritize supporting local organizations in need. The company's ultimate aim is to contribute positively to both the world of design and greater society at large.
